about.storyPart1: Yatangiye mu 2010, Ikigo OLD Fox cyatangiye n'intego yoroshye ariko ifite akamaro: guhuza abantu n'ahantu h'ingenzi mu by'umwuka ku isi. Uwashinze iki kigo, Sarah Johnson, yahawe ubutumwa n'ubunararibonye bwe bwahindutse ku hantu hatandukanye h'amadini ku isi.
about.storyPart2: Icyatangiye nk'igikorwa gito gitanga ingendo ziyobowe ku hantu h'ubusabaniramana mu gace, ubu hakaba ikigo ryubashywe mu by'ubukerarugendo bw'amadini, gikora ku bantu ibihumbi bashaka umwuka buri mwaka.
about.quote1: Tangira urugendo rwo gukurikirana ibintu by'umwuka no kwinjira mu muco hamwe na OldFox.
about.quote2: Menya ubwiza bukomeye n'akamaro k'umwuka k'ahantu hera ku isi yose.

expertGuides.title: Abayobozi b'Inzobere
expertGuides.description: Abayobozi bacu si abayobozi b'ingendo gusa, ahubwo ni abahanga mu byerekeye amadini n'imico y'ibihugu.

respectfulApproach.title: Uburyo bw'Icyubahiro
respectfulApproach.description: Twemeza ko ingendo zacu zose zikorwa mu cyubahiro gikomeye ku migenzo n'imyizerere y'ibihugu.

immersiveExperiences.title: Ubunararibonye Bwuzuye
immersiveExperiences.description: Jya hirya yo gusura ahantu gusa, ufite amahirwe yo kwiyumvisha, gusenga, no gukora imigenzo y'umwuka.

diverseDestinations.title: Ibyerekezo Bitandukanye
diverseDestinations.description: Kuva ku nsengero za kera kugeza ku hantu h'ubusabaniramana bwa none, dufite ahantu hatandukanye h'umwuka.

smallGroups.title: Amatsinda Mato
smallGroups.description: Tugumisha amatsinda yacu mato kugira ngo duhe buri wese ubunararibonye bwiza kandi bufite igisobanuro.

sustainableTourism.title: Ubukerarugendo Burambye
sustainableTourism.description: Twiyemeje kugabanya ingaruka ku bidukikije no gushyigikira abaturage b'ibihugu.

about.ctaDescription: Twifatanye mu rugendo ruhindura ubuzima ku byerekezo by'umwuka byubashywe cyane ku isi.

hero.title: OldFox-Tour:Ingendo Nyobokamana Ziteguwe Neza
hero.internationalTourDesc: OldFox ikuyobora ahantu h'umwuka ku isi yose
hero.religionTourDesc: Sura ahantu hera ufashijwe n'ubumenyi bw'inzobere za OldFox
hero.localTourDesc: Menya ahantu hatangaje mu by'umwuka n'ubukera rugendo wasura hamwe na Oldfox

footer.description: Sura isi na Exodus: Umufatanya bikorwa

destinations.rwandaDescription: Menya umurage w'idini w'u Rwanda, uhuza umuco n'umwuka.
destinations.israelDescription: Menya  umurage ukungahaye wo mu mwuka wa Isiraheli n'ibiranga ahera.
destinations.turkeyDescription: Menya ahantu hera muri Turukiya, ihuriro ry'amadini ya kera.
destinations.egyptDescription: Menya ibitangaza byo mu mwuka bya Misiri hamwe n'insengero za kera.

service.title: Serivisi
service.subtitle: Serivisi Dutanga
service.description: Subiza amaso ku bimenyetso bitandukanye by'amadini no ku mibereho y'umwuka, bigaragaza umuco ukungahaye n'imigenzo gakondo. Suzuma insengero zera, za kiliziya za kera, n'amahema y'itorero arangwa n'amahoro, buri kimwe gifite inkuru z'imihango ya kera n'ukwizera gukomeye. Ujye mu minsi mikuru n'imigenzo y'umwuka ihuza abantu, ikwereke neza urugendo rw'ubumwe n'ukwemera abatuye isi bose bahuriyeho.

spiritualGrowth.title: Gukura mu by'Umwuka
spiritualGrowth.description: Serivisi zacu zigamije guteza imbere imibanire ikomeye y'umwuka no gukura k'umuntu ku giti cye, ikagufasha mu rugendo rwawe rwo kwimenya no gusobanukiwa.

culturalImmersion.title: Kwinjira mu Muco
culturalImmersion.description: Menya ubudasa bw'amadini y'isi n'imico mu buryo buziguye, ukagura uko ubona ibintu no gusobanukirwa imigenzo itandukanye y'umwuka.

expertGuidance.title: Ubuyobozi bw'Inzobere
expertGuidance.description: Kugira inyungu z'ubumenyi n'ibitekerezo by'abayobozi bacu b'umwuka bafite ubunararibonye n'inzobere zo mu gace batanga inyito n'ubusobanuro bwimbitse bw'ahantu hera n'imigenzo.

stressRelief.title: Kugabanya Umuhangayiko
stressRelief.description: Imyiherero yacu na serivisi zo kwiyumvisha bitanga akaruhuko ku muhangayiko wa buri munsi, biteza imbere kuryoherwa, kwitaho, n'imibereho myiza muri rusange.

communityConnection.title: Guhuza Umuryango
communityConnection.description: Ifatanye n'umuryango w'abantu bafite ibitekerezo bimwe ku ngendo z'umwuka zisa, biteza imbere imibanire ifite igisobanuro n'ubunararibonye busangiwe.

personalizedExperiences.title: Ubunararibonye Bwihariye
personalizedExperiences.description: Dutegura serivisi zacu kugira ngo zihure n'ibyo ukeneye mu by'umwuka n'ibyo ukunda ku giti cyawe, twemeza ubunararibonye bwimbitse kandi buhindura ubuzima.

virtualPilgrimage.title: Urugendo rw'Umwuka Rutaziguye
virtualPilgrimage.description: Menya ahantu hera uri mu rugo rwawe ukoresheje ikoranabuhanga ryacu rishya rya VR.

meditationRetreats.title: Imyiherero yo Kwiyumvisha Iyobowe
meditationRetreats.description: Ifatanye n'imyiherero yacu iyobowe n'inzobere mu hantu hatekanye kugira ngo ubone amahoro yo mu mutima no gukura mu by'umwuka.

heritageTours.title: Ingendo z'Umurage w'Amadini
heritageTours.description: Menya umurage ukungahaye w'amadini y'imico itandukanye hamwe n'ingendo zacu zateguwe neza.

innovation.title: Ibishya mu Bukerarugendo bw'Amadini
innovation.subtitle: Gukoresha Ikoranabuhanga mu Ngendo z'Umwuka
innovation.description: Turi ku isonga mu guhuza ikoranabuhanga rishya n'ubukerarugendo bw'amadini gakondo. Uburyo bwacu bushya burimo:

items.item1: Ingendo ziyobowe na Augmented Reality (AR) z'ahantu h'amadini
items.item2: Gutegura urugendo rw'umwuka rwihariye hakoreshejwe AI
items.item3: Uburyo bwo gutanga impano bushingiye kuri blockchain ku bigo by'amadini
items.item4: Ibyumba byo kwiyumvisha no gusenga bya virtual reality

step1.title: Kujya Inama
step1.description: Kuganira ku ntego zawe z'umwuka n'ibyo ukunda

step2.title: Gutegura Byihariye
step2.description: Gutegura urugendo rwawe hakurikijwe ibyo ukeneye byihariye

step3.title: Kwitegura
step3.description: Kubona ubuyobozi ku kwitegura mu by'umwuka no mu buryo bwiza

testimonial1.quote: Serivisi y'Urugendo rw'Umwuka Rutaziguye itangwa n'iki kigo ni ukuri ikintu gishya cyane. Yanyemereye guhuza n'ahantu hera sinigeze ntekereza ko nzashobora gusura. Ubunararibonye bwari bukomeye kandi bwuzuye mu by'umwuka.
testimonial1.name: Sarah Thompson
testimonial1.title: Uwagize uruhare mu Rugendo rw'Umwuka Rutaziguye

testimonial2.quote: Imyiherero yabo yo Kwiyumvisha Iyobowe yahindiye imyitozo yanjye y'umwuka. Ahantu hatekanye n'ubuyobozi bw'inzobere byatanze ubunararibonye butibagirana bw'amahoro yo mu mutima.
testimonial2.name: Michael Chen
testimonial2.title: Uwagize uruhare mu Myiherero yo Kwiyumvisha

testimonial3.quote: Urugendo rw'Umurage w'Amadini rwari urugendo rufunguye amaso mu mico n'amadini atandukanye. Rwaguriye imbere uko mbona ibintu kandi rwongera ubushobozi bwanjye bwo gushima amadini y'isi.
testimonial3.name: Amira Hassan
testimonial3.title: Uwagize uruhare mu Rugendo rw'Umurage

uniqueApproach.title: Uburyo Bwacu Bwihariye mu Bukerarugendo bw'Amadini
uniqueApproach.subtitle: Guhuza Umuco na Gakondo n'Ibishya
uniqueApproach.description: Uburyo bwacu mu bukerarugendo bw'amadini bushingiye ku cyubahiro cy'umuco na gakondo ndetse no gukoresha ibishya by'igihe. Dushaka:

items.item1: Kubungabunga no guteza imbere ubunararibonye nyakuri bw'umwuka
items.item2: Gukoresha ikoranabuhanga kugira ngo hongerwe ubushobozi bwo kugera no gusobanukirwa
items.item3: Guteza imbere ikiganiro hagati y'amadini n'icyubahiro rusange
items.item4: Gushyira imbere imigenzereze y'ubukerarugendo burambye kandi bufite inshingano
items.item5: Gutanga ubufasha bwuzuye mbere, mu gihe, na nyuma y'urugendo rwawe

products.title: Ibicuruzwa
products.subtitle: Ibicuruzwa by'Amateka
products.discription: Sura biro yacu kugirango ugure ibicuruzwa by'idini bifite ireme mu buryo bwa hafi.

contact.question_message: NIBA ufite ikibazo icyo ari cyo cyose ntuzatinye kutwandikira.
contact.subject: Icyo usaba

forgotPassword.title: Wibagiwe Ijambo ry'Ibanga?
forgotPassword.statusSuccess: Ubutumwa bwo kubyutsa ijambo ry'ibanga bwoherejwe!

profile.title: Ikibaho cy'Umukoresha
profile.clickToUpload: Kanda kuri iyi foto kugira ngo ushyiremo ifoto nshya y'umwirondoro
profile.likedDestinationsDescription: Aha ni ahantu wakunze. Bizagaragara ku rupapuro rw'ahabanza.
profile.supportDescription: Niba ufite ibibazo cyangwa se hari icyo ushaka kubaza, ntutinye guhita utwandikira.
profile.describeProblem: Sobanura ikibazo cyawe cyangwa ikibazo ufite
profile.newDestinationTutor: Gishya! Kanda hano kugira ngo umenye byinshi kuri aha hantu.

rwanda.name: U Rwanda
rwanda.description: Menya ubwiza n'umuco w'Igihugu cy'Imisozi Igihumbi.

turkey.name: Turukiya
turkey.description: Injira mu muco ukomeye w'umurwa mukuru wa Turukiya.

israel.name: Isiraheli
israel.description: Rambagira amateka n'imisozi itandukanye y'Igihugu Cyera.

tours.internationalTour: OldFox igufasha gusura ahantu h'amateka y'iyobokamana ku isi
tours.religionTour: Sura ahantu hatagatifu ukoresheje ubunararibonye bwa OldFox
tours.localTour: Menya ahantu hihishe h'iyobokamana hafi yawe ukoresheje OldFox

KibehoHolyLand.name: Ahera ha Kibeho
KibehoHolyLand.description: Hazwi kubera Amabonekerwa ya Bikira Mariya i Kibeho, aha ni hamwe gusa hemewe na Vatikani muri Afurika.
KibehoHolyLand.significance: Ahantu hakomeye h’ubusabaniramana muri Kiliziya Gatolika, aho Umubyeyi Bikira Mariya yabonekeye abakobwa batatu mu myaka ya 1980.

ReginaPacisCathedral.name: Katedrali Regina Pacis
ReginaPacisCathedral.description: Katedrali y'ingenzi y'Abakatolika i Kigali, yerekana ubwubatsi bw'igikristo bwa none bwa Afurika.
ReginaPacisCathedral.significance: Ikibuga cy'amasengesho y'Abakatolika mu murwa mukuru w'u Rwanda

NyakibandaSeminary.name: Seminari ya Nyakibanda
NyakibandaSeminary.description: Imwe mu maseminari akuru kandi ashaje mu Rwanda, yigisha abapadiri kuva mu 1936.
NyakibandaSeminary.significance: Ikigo cy'amateka cyo kwigisha no gutoza idini

WesternWall.name: Inkike y'Iburengerazuba
WesternWall.description: Ahantu hera cyane mu idini y'Abayahudi, igice cy'inkike ya kera ya Tempeli.
WesternWall.significance: Inkike isigaye ya Tempeli ya Kabiri ya Yerusalemu

ChurchOfTheHolySepulchre.name: Kiliziya y'Imva Ntagatifu
ChurchOfTheHolySepulchre.description: Ahantu gakondo h'aho Yesu yabambwe, ashyingurwa, kandi azuka.
ChurchOfTheHolySepulchre.significance: Ahantu h'ingenzi h'urugendo rw'amadini menshi y'Abakristo

AlAqsaMosque.name: Umusigiti wa Al-Aqsa
AlAqsaMosque.description: Ahantu ha gatatu hera cyane mu Buyisilamu, hari ku Musozi wa Tempeli.

BahaiGardens.name: Ubusitani bwa Bahá'í
BahaiGardens.description: Ubusitani bw'intambike bukikije Imva ya Báb i Haifa.
BahaiGardens.significance: Ikibuga Nyobokamana cya Bahá'í ku Isi

SeaOfGalilee.name: Inyanja ya Galilaya
SeaOfGalilee.description: Inyanja y'amazi meza ifitanye isano n'ibikorwa byinshi mu buzima bwa Yesu.
SeaOfGalilee.significance: Ahantu h'ingenzi ku bahererezi b'Abakristo n'abakunzi ba kamere

GreatPyramidOfGiza.name: Piramide Nini ya Giza
GreatPyramidOfGiza.description: Imwe mu Bitangaza Birindwi bya Kera by'Isi, yubatswe nk'imva ya Farawo Khufu.
GreatPyramidOfGiza.significance: Ikimenyetso cy'ubwami bwa Egiputa ya kera n'igitangaza cy'ubwubatsi

LuxorTemple.name: Urusengero rwa Luxor
LuxorTemple.description: Urwego runini rw'urusengero rwa Egiputa ya kera ruri ku nkombe y'iburasirazuba bw'umugezi Nili.
LuxorTemple.significance: Ahantu h'ingenzi h'idini rya Egiputa ya kera n'amateka

SaintCatherinesMonastery.name: Monasteri ya Mutagatifu Katerina
SaintCatherinesMonastery.description: Imwe mu monasteri z'Abakristo zikora zikiri nshya cyane ku isi.
SaintCatherinesMonastery.significance: Ahantu h'ingenzi ku Bakristo b'Abortodogisi kandi hakaba n'inyandiko z'agaciro

HagiaSophia.name: Hagia Sophia
HagiaSophia.description: Yari katedrali y'Abakristo b'Abagiriki Ortodogisi, nyuma iba umusigiti w'Abaturuki, ubu ni inzu ndangamurage.
HagiaSophia.significance: Igitangaza cy'ubwubatsi n'ikimenyetso cy'amateka atandukanye ya Istanbul

Ephesus.name: Efeso
Ephesus.description: Umujyi wa kera w'Abagiriki ku nkombe ya Ionia, uzwi cyane ku rusengero rwa Artemis.
Ephesus.significance: Umwe mu mijyi ya kera yabungabunzwe neza cyane mu Mediterane

Cappadocia.name: Kapadokiya
Cappadocia.description: Akarere kazwi cyane ku 'nkingi z'abazimu', zakozwe n'imyuka ya volukano.
Cappadocia.significance: Ubutaka budasanzwe n'amateka y'Ubukristo bwa mbere

activities.1: Ingendo mu Mijyi yo Munsi y'Ubutaka
